briefdescription.para: This function initialize the session context.
Initialize the fsm internal private context.
This is the FSM that treat input/output events.
This function adjust context parameters in case download windows has already been started.

parameterdescription.para: value of the next block -1 if there is no more block or day in download windows

briefdescription.para: This file implement everything required to deal with Download session.
